channel.title: Making the Most of NetBeans
channel.description: A selection of articles and tutorials from netbeans.org, opensource IDE and application backplane

item.title: Using Virtual Forms in NetBeans IDE
item.description: This tutorial explains how to use virtual forms in NetBeans IDE 6.1.

item.title: Connecting to a MySQL Database
item.description: This document demonstrates how to configure the MySQL database server on your computer and set up a connection to it from NetBeans IDE.

item.title: Setting Up NetBeans IDE, JDK 6 and JavaFX on 32-bit Intel Macs
item.description: How to set up the SoyLatte JDK 6 and JavaFX on Intel Macs with Mac OS X 10.4 and 32-bit CPUs, and configure NetBeans IDE as a tool.
